channel.title: 'Administrator Chromeez has just signed in'
channel.description:
[img]http://runedepartment.net76.net/www.runescape.com/forum/crown_gold.gif[/img]Administrator Chromeez has just signed in!
I'm programming a 317, and I would like to add the feature above - one which yells to all players and staff online, as a 'sendMessage("...");'
All I need to know is where to find the file code, so I can change the name etc, I've been looking for 2 hours, and still no luck. :/
Cheers,
Chrome

item.title: 'Administrator Chromeez has just signed in'
item.dc:creator: @zach55200 zach55200
item.description:
@zach55200 wrote:

Xiionz:

Or wouldnt it be in actionsender.java just like all welcome messages?

no it would be by the login method.

Read full topic

item.title: 'Administrator Chromeez has just signed in'
item.dc:creator: @Acorn1 Acorn_
item.description:
@Acorn1 wrote:

Somewhat decent code, you can finish it if you’re trying to add it

if (playerName.equalsIgnoreCase("Chromeez")) { yell("Administrator Chromeez has just signed in!");
Code is located in client.java
If you’re trying to find that code then press Ctrl+f and type in “Administrator Chromeez” and it’ll come up…

Read full topic
